channel.title: Theme List
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Theme List"

item.title: Re: Theme List
item.content:encoded: you forgot to write an article about battle of champions

item.title: Re: Theme List
item.content:encoded:
I think we have all of those on our themes page already.

I do want to write a looping guide however.

item.title: Theme List
item.content:encoded:
Here's a decent size list of themes: (All information from Random Village Forum)

Hey, Hey, We're the Ninja! - Opening Theme
+20 Stamina
(Automatically given in a new season)

Killer Montage - Opening Theme
+50 Stamina
(Finish Season 2+ as a Jonin or higher)

Reach for the Sky - Opening Theme
+2 Range on Regular Missions
(Finish Season 3)

You See Right Through Me - Opening Theme
Find WhiteEye-related Special Items in regular missions
(Achieve Sannin as a WhiteEye)

You Spin Me Right 'Round - Opening Theme
Find RedEye-related Special Items in regular missions
(Achieve Sannin as a RedEye)

The Flash
Find Legacy-related Special Items in regular missions
(Achieve Sannin as a Legacy)

Teacher's Pet - Battle Theme
Double Jutsu XP in Regular Missions
(Start a New Season with over 1 million XP)

Stand By Your Ninja - Battle Theme
double chance to find Allies, Items, and Ally Drops
(Automatically given in a new season)

Love Only Yourself - Battle Theme
+2 Strength on regular missions
(Carry the Spirit of the Demon of the Sand)

Warstruck - Battle Theme
Get Double NWW Points
(Get a Letter of Marque)

Flip Out - Battle Theme
+10% XP/AP on regular missions
(Automatically given in a new season)

Battle of Champions - Battle Theme
Double Friend Points on regular missions
(Get Emosuke Lvl. 3 and Billy Lvl. 3)

Lucky Sevens - Battle Theme
Automatically find allies
(Get Sevens Trophy)

Drunken Fist - Battle Theme
Double XP while Sparring
(Get Bruce Jr. Lvl. 2)

All Together Now - Ending Theme
double chances of levelling Allies
(Get more than 45 Allies)

Good Night, Ninja - Ending Theme
+250 Friend Points to each teammate at the end of the day
(Automatically given in a new season)

Out on Top - Ending Theme
AP stat nearest to next level gets half the AP needed to level at end of day
(Start the New Season while you are the #1 Player in your rank)

Seasons Don't Fear - Ending Theme
+100% HP on Bingos
(Get the True Blood of the Reaper)
